name: facebook black&red www edition
description: a theme based off of the simply black facebook theme; see changelog for where it differs. although it may not be done for a while, the finished colour scheme will feature black, red and gold (for contrast text such as tags) as the main colour scheme. name is chosen ready for the finished theme. please feel free to mention if any specific css is for messenger.com (the original style was for that as well, however i figure it's better to separate them). feel free to suggest style settings you would like to see.

user.name: Seirra Blake
user.about: all of my projects deliberately have minimal white-space to improve performance. to make them human readable just go to http://unminify.com/ . Feel free to pay me to deliver other themes you may want, such as an alternative theme, extra polish, or whatever it may be; if you can, try putting the request in the payment notes, my paypal account is currently set up to accept GBP or USD if you wish to send an alternative currency let me know and I can add the currency to my account. An assumption is made that you have the extension dark reader installed

additional_info:
34
___
*improved theming
*chats are now mostly transparent, allowing you to more easily see what's underneath without closing them
*chats now have less whitespace so you can read more of them at a time
*removed code whitespace
*removed duplicate code
*chats no longer have borders to improve this transparency
33
___
*remove visually pointless "posts" header
*remove extra padding from feed so more screen space is used
*greater improved theming
*remove duplicate code
*the timeline is now full width, making long posts much easier to read
32
___
*improve positioning in support inbox
*translate code comments
*remove whitespace in code
*remove duplicate code
*improve theming
31
___
*comments should be dark themed again

___
*text from sent links should now be legible

___
*permission request windows (or at least, the pasta evangelist one) are now fully legible

___
*page visit chat windows have black backgrounds again

*chat windows have black backgrounds again

*removed some white space
25
___
*memories now have black backgrounds

___
*the comments section for the friendship game (maybe others too) is now black, and the play dialog is transparent to make more of the background art visible

*reactions no longer trail off into the right pane as it has been moved further to the right
*removed top padding so there's less scrolling and more content
